Description: Gut renovated three bed, one bath. Conveniently located near park. Pet friendly. Kitchen consist of granite countertops, lots of cabinets and storage spaces, stainless steel appliances, with dishwasher. Bathroom has been gut renovated as well. Spacious bedrooms with ample closet space. New hardwood floors. Large outdoor porch. Backyard available to barbecue. Overall beautiful unit.
